samples.question: Will the plant wilt?
sentences: The pot is made of clay
The plant hasn't been watered recently
Plants wilt when they need water
The soil around the plant is very dry
samples.full_text: The pot is made of clay The plant hasn't been watered recently Plants wilt when they need water The soil around the plant is very dry Will the plant wilt?

samples.question: Will the flowers bloom?
sentences: The garden has a wooden fence
samples.full_text: Spring season is beginning Flowers bloom when spring arrives The garden has a wooden fence The weather is getting warmer Will the flowers bloom?

samples.question: Will the dog bark?
sentences: A stranger is walking toward the house
The dog sees the approaching person
samples.full_text: A stranger is walking toward the house The mailman delivered packages yesterday The dog sees the approaching person Dogs bark when strangers approach Will the dog bark?
